name: Don Nelo - Gordo
additionalNotes: Don Nelo is an outstanding line of cigars produced in the homonymous factory in Estelí, Nicaragua. Offering three varieties of wrapping: Mexican mature, Ecuadorian pink habano and Ecuadorian clear habano, Don Nelo stands out for its medium to strong strength and a profile of earthy and spicy flavor balanced by sweet notes of cream. Each cigar of this line uses Nicaraguan cigar grown in the Jalapa region, with filling from Estelí, Nicaragua. From his elegant presentation to his impeccable construction, Don Nelo exemplifies Casa Caraballo’s commitment to excellence. If you are looking for a complex and refined experience, Don Nelo cigars are the perfect choice for lovers of good cigars.
